name: MissKaty RoBot
description: A multi-function Telegram bot built using Python and Pyrogram.

API_ID.description: Get your API ID from https://my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Get your API hash from https://my.telegram.org

USER_SESSION.description: Pyrogram session string for your Telegram user account.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Bot token from @BotFather (only for assistant bot usage).

LOG_CHANNEL.description: Private channel/group ID where logs will be sent (must start with -100)

DATABASE_URI.description: MongoDB connection URI (e.g. from MongoDB Atlas).

SUDO.description: Comma-separated user IDs allowed to use sudo commands.

OWNER_ID.description: Numeric Telegram ID of the bot owner.

DATABASE_NAME.description: Optional: Name of your MongoDB database.
